name: Sutte Hakkun BS Version 2
storyline: Following the story of the first transmission, the once restored rainbow fell again on the Rainbow Islands, now due to "popular request from Satellaview users", and Sutte Hakkun sets out to find the shards again.
summary: Sutte Hakkun BS Version 2 is a platform/puzzle game that was released in 1998 in Japan. As the game's title implies, it is a sequel of sorts to the earlier Sutte Hakkun (Nov. 1997) and Sutte Hakkun Event Version (Oct. 1997). A later titles in the same series, Sutte Hakkun '98 (Dec. 1998) followed a month after the broadcast of Sutte Hakkun Version 2.
